entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wekweeti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:56 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 42. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
